TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from delighted users who love our app for building food
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized the way I cook meals! With its intuitive interface and powerful features, I can design dishes with ease and precision.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a professional chef, I'm always seeking innovative tools to enhance my culinary creations. This app has exceeded my expectations, allowing me to construct complex flavors with remarkable efficiency.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether you're a seasoned foodie or a budding home cook, this app is a game-changer. It empowers you to craft mouthwatering dishes with confidence and creativity.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to commonly asked questions on creating meals from ingredients
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What can I make with this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to input the ingredients you have on hand and get recipe ideas for dishes you can build using those items. It's the perfect tool for using up leftovers or random pantry items.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the recipe generator work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Just enter the foods you want to use and our algorithm will scour thousands of recipes to find matches that incorporate those ingredients. You can filter further by cuisine, dietary needs, cook time and more.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, you can create an account to bookmark any recipes you want to make again. Your favorites will be synced across devices.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Definitely. Each recipe includes a full breakdown of calories, macros, and micronutrients per serving based on the ingredients used.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a mobile app version?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Our app is currently web-based only, but we are working on releasing native iOS and Android apps in the coming months for easier grocery shopping.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Discover recipes, plan meals, and simplify your cooking experience.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Discover a world of recipes, techniques, and culinary inspiration. From novice cooks to seasoned chefs, our app has everything you need to elevate your cooking game.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: FoodBuild is a revolutionary platform that empowers culinary enthusiasts and professionals to design and construct their dream dishes.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: With our cutting-edge technology, users can explore a vast library of ingredients, flavors, and cooking techniques, and seamlessly combine them to create unique and mouthwatering recipes.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_3: Whether you're a home chef seeking inspiration or a professional chef looking to push the boundaries of culinary creativity, FoodBuild is your ultimate companion.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Join our community and unleash your culinary genius today.
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_ALREADY_HAVE_ACCOUNT_P: Already a culinary pro? Sign in
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: FoodBuild empowers home cooks and professional chefs alike to design mouthwatering dishes. Join our community of food enthusiasts and unleash your culinary creativity!
FEATURE_1_BODY: Our user-friendly interface allows you to easily create and customize recipes with drag-and-drop ingredients and step-by-step instructions.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Access our vast library of ingredients with detailed nutritional information, sourcing details, and substitution suggestions.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Effortlessly scale recipes up or down to suit your desired portion sizes, while automatically adjusting measurements and cooking times.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Easily filter recipes based on your dietary needs, such as vegan, gluten-free, keto, or allergen-specific requirements.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Automatically generate shopping lists from your selected recipes, with the ability to cross off items and sync across devices.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Share your culinary creations with friends and family, leave reviews, and discover new recipes from a vibrant community of food enthusiasts.
CTA_BODY: Streamline your food production process with our innovative app. From farm to table, we've got you covered.
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Transform the way you build food
HERO_SUBTITLE: Craft delectable dishes with innovative techniques and ingredients.
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Effortlessly plan, organize and execute your food production workflow
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's discuss your food building app needs
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Food Building App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is a food building app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our food building app allows users to design and construct virtual models of various food items and dishes using 3D modeling tools. Think of it like a digital kitchen for creating edible masterpieces!
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: The app is designed for anyone with an interest in food and creativity. Whether you're a professional chef, an amateur cook, or just someone who enjoys playing with their food, our app provides a fun and engaging way to explore culinary artistry.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What features does the app offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Our app includes a vast library of food ingredients, textures, and cooking utensils that you can use to build your virtual dishes. You can also experiment with different flavors, cooking techniques, and plating styles to create truly unique and visually stunning food models.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I share my food creations?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! Our app has a built-in community feature that allows you to share your food models with others, get feedback, and even participate in virtual cooking challenges and competitions. You can also export your creations as high-quality images or 3D files for printing or further editing.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Source locally grown, organic produce for vibrant flavors.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Unleash your inner chef with endless recipe possibilities.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Build balanced, wholesome dishes for optimal health.
